name: removeClass
desc: This action removes a class from the targeted component
exampleDesc: In this example, we register a stylesheet with the registerStylesheet action. When we click the button it will remove the custom myLabel class from the label and thus the styles set in the registerStylesheet action

usage.msg: The value of the input is currently ((state.inputUsername.value))

propSpec.desc: Message that you wish to disolay in the console
